channel.title: Noob Messages
channel.description:
Well since this is the only place to talk about it...
I wouldn't really consider it spam as much as a question/story thread.
So, Recently I've been getting TONS of messages for FTP/CBA To Posters/Junior Members asking for sources. Was wondering if anybody else has been getting these, JUST RECENTLY

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

i had ftp once

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I used to get these all the time when I was active in the server help and client hacking sections. About 5 months after i stopped posting, it slowed down. Been about 6 months though since I got a single message for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

All the time… god when I released Myth-scape yesterday I had to weed out 30 messages :s

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Actually, now that I’ve actually looked at my messages instead of ignoring them I get them every so often but not any really recent ones.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I get a few a day, but most just want actual help, not “Yo, do this for me, you know how, plox!”. People who just beg I ignore.

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:17, topic:429778”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=532456.msg3892227#msg3892227 date=1326969835]
for a good while, I was getting at least one help request a day witch I seriously hated because they wanted something stupid, like a funpk area. I’m willing to help people who are new to this out, but you could at least look for a tutorial.
[/quote]

I don’t think you’re willing to help out anyone, based off your signature.[/quote]
The thing is that I don’t care that people want some help, but they just ignore the fact that there’s google, a tutorial section, and other private server sites. With all these things to your advantage you would thing bugging me would wait…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan

@vManlyMan wrote:

When I used to post in the Server Help section and Server Tutorial sections a lot, people would PM me. But since I stopped going there, the PM’s have stopped.

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

You should set the goal of becoming a Moparian only if you are posting useful/non-spam posts that regard to a conversation and stay on topic. Which is why I don’ refer to myself as a “True moparian”

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:

Why do you start so many threads regarding pointless shit?

Post count, duh?
[/quote]Well duh, but he is never infracted.[/quote]
I thought the goal was to become a moparian and that is your life’s dream

item.title: Noob Messages
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:429778”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=532456.msg3891766#msg3891766 date=1326930207]
I get tons of pms from noobs all the time. Like this “wet dreams” guy, constantly pming me. Annoying, ya know?
[/quote]

Trolololol.

I get this sometimes, just random people asking for help. Sometimes they’re ‘CBA to post’ members, sometimes just junior members. It’s not annoying, just help them lol. How long will it take you to help them? How long will it take them to figure it out on their own? A lonnnnng time. I’m not saying spoonfeeding is good, I’m saying helping people out is good…[/quote]
I do help them <3 I was just wondering if anyone else got them XD

Lol @ reyx.

Read full topic
